titleStmt.title: SII 12.209: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 209. (A.R. No. 319 of 1913). CHIDAMBARAM, CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE THIRD PRĀKĀRA IN THE NAṬARĀJA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription dated in the 19th year of Sakalabhuvanachakravarttin Avaṉiāḷappiṟandār alias Kōpperuñjiṅga, records an order of Śōḻakōṉ issued to the authorities of the temple at Chidambaram to engrave on the walls of their temple, the tax-free gift of the garden called ‘Vaḻiyaḍimaikoṇḍāṉ’Cf. the name Tuḍand-aḍimai-koṇḍāṉ mentioned in No. 174 above.at Vikramaśiṅgapuram belonging to the god Āḷudaiya-Nāyaṉār and the land granted for the maintenance of 10 servants looking after this garden, comprising in all 47(1/2) mā of land in extent.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ sakalabhu vaṉa[ ccakravatti kaḷ śrī Avaṉi] Āḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅka tevaṟku yāṇṭu pattoṉpatāvatu coḻakoṉ Olai . teṉṉavaṉbrahmamārā yarum
jayatuṅkappallavarayarum kurukulattarayarum Uṭaiyār tiruruciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrī māheśva ra k kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum cāmutāyañ cey
vārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum [kaṇṭu viṭu tantatāvatu . Āḷuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku vaḻiyaṭimaikoṇṭāṉ Eṉṉum perāl vikkirama ciṅka
purattu Iṅkiṭṭucceyvitta tiruttoppu nilam Oru Ittiruttoppuk kuṭikaḷ kaimutal koṇṭu payirceytu varukiṟa per pattukku Ilakkaikkum koṟṟukkum per
Oṉṟukku naṉcey nilam Iraṇṭu māvāka nilam Irupatu māvukku Ivvūrp paṭaippaṟṟile naṉcey nilattile patiṉaṟu māvum nikki niṉṟa nilam nālumāvukkup puṉcey nilatti
le ṇṭu māvum Āka Ittiruttoppu Uṭpaṭa nilam 4ppatteḻu māvaraiyum patiṉeṭṭāvatu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyākat tevar Iṭṭaruḷiṉapaṭiye
tirumāḷikaiyile kalveṭṭuvikka paṇṇuvate . Ivai coḻako ṉeḻutteṉṟu Iṭṭup pukunta Evaṟ tiṭṭuppaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu poṉ
Digital edition of SII 12.209 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
